span.p: Beginning in January 2020, the minimum pay for bus drivers is $15/hour. And that increases considerably with time and experience.
Are you interested in a career with a flexible work schedule and great benefits? If so, apply today to be a school bus driver! Learn more on our Transportation Jobs site.

a.title: Go to comments for We Are Hiring Bus Drivers!
